content:
Today, on March 31, Russia attacked Balism in Kherson region, continuing the destruction of industrial infrastructure of the region.

About thisReportThe forces of the South Defense.

"The enemy continues the tactics of point rocket strokes, testing and exploring air defense systems," the message reads.

The scale of the damage is specified.

"Information about the victims did not come," the military said.

As reportedArmyinform, Russian troops hit the Hurricane RSSV on the village in Kharkiv: a 19-year-old guy was killed.
title: Russia attacked the Baltic science of Kherson region
